til.title: Chinese Classics & Poetry — Vivien's Recommendations
til.preview: I finally have time to dive into the deep lit world my friend Vivien introduced me to. Below is a complete tabled overview of the Chinese classics and poetry she recommended, complete with her thoughts and why they matter.
